question: All the following announcements were made at the Delhi Durbar in 1911 except one. Identify that one:
option1: Transfer of Capital from Calcutta to Delhi
option3: Separation of Bihar, Orissa and Chhotanagpur from Bengalâ€™s Jurisdiction
option4: Election of Indians to the various legislative councils in India
answer: Election of Indians to the various legislative councils in India
explanation: please note that following were also declared in the same- 1. A month`s extra pay for soldiers and subordinate Civil Servants 2. Establishment of a new university at Dhaka 3. Declaration of eligibility of Indians for getting a Victoria Cross 4. Creation of a Governor-in Council for United Bengal 5. Reduction of Assam into a Chief Commissionership Option D was a part of Minto Morley reforms.
